answerText: Foucault's Pendulum [or Il pendolo di Foucault][10] This Italian author, whose recent novel The Prague Cemetery is also about conspiracy theories, wrote Foucault's Pendulum and described some murders investigated by William of Baskerville in The Name of the Rose.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Maryland A + Chicago B | 2 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The group at the heart of this novel carries out rituals in which they kiss each other's buttocks in order to honor the great Indian serpent Kundalini. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which the vanity publishers Diotallevi, Belbo, and Casaubon decide to come with their own conspiracy involving the Knights Templar, which they call "The Plan."
